video_prompt: Chaotic sci-fi battle unfolding: massive futuristic structure disintegrates, showering debris. Spacecraft dogfight with energy weapon flashes. Armored soldiers aggressively fire advanced weaponry on shattered ground. Dynamic light from explosions and muzzle flashes illuminates unfolding destruction.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Chaotic sci-fi battle in a shattering cylindrical space city. Futuristic spacecraft engage in dogfights amidst exploding debris. Heavily armored soldiers battle on a shattered platform, firing energy weapons. Dynamic lighting, cool blues and grays with orange/red weapon flashes. Intense, immersive perspective.
refined_video_prompt: A chaotic sci-fi battle dynamically unfolds. A massive futuristic structure rapidly crumbles, showering debris. Spacecraft zip through the sky, engaging in a dogfight, their energy weapons flashing and streaking. Armored soldiers aggressively advance, firing advanced weaponry, causing ground impacts to erupt. Explosions ripple and muzzle flashes punctuate the air, casting dynamic, flickering light across the rapidly unfolding destruction.
